item.description:
It's time to celebrate fashion, make new connections and enjoy the company of your fashion friends.  Attend some of the fashion events in the area that are starting around 6pm then come to the very fashionable Forum restaurant, in the heart of the Back Bay fashion district, where we will have an area reserved for the Boston Fashion Meetup group.

Forum will provide us with comped wine from one of their vintners and of course you can order from the menu too.  There is no meetup fee for this event.

This is the first of many networking events for the upcoming year

Here is a list of some of the Boston Fashion Week  events happening on Wednesday 10-3

On the COPLEY CATWALK

RETAIL/FASHION TRUCK SHOWCASE

SOUTH SHORE SWIMWEAR

for the full schedule go to the Boston Fashion Week Website

http://www.bostonfashionweek.com/#Wednesday, October 3

Look Forward to seeing you there.
item.how_to_find_us: Go to the alcove on the right side of the first floor bar.
item.name: "Forum after Fashion" Networking event/party
